title: Product Marketing Manager
description: Job Opening ID: 123979Singapore, SingaporeFull-TimeRegularCompany OverviewCalling the adventurers ready to join a company that's pushing the limits of nanotechnology to keep the digital revolution rolling. At KLA, we're making technology advancements that are bigger—and tinier—than the world has ever seen.Who are we? We research, develop, and manufacture the world's most advanced inspection and measurement equipment for the semiconductor and nanoelectronics industries. We enable the digital age by pushing the boundaries of technology, creating tools capable of finding defects smaller than a wavelength of visible light. We create smarter processes so that technology leaders can manufacture high-performance chips—the kind in that phone in your pocket, the tablet on your desk and nearly every electronic device you own—faster and better. We're passionate about creating solutions that drive progress and help people do what wouldn't be possible without us. The future is calling. Will you answer?Group/DivisionWith over 40 years of semiconductor process control experience, chipmakers around the globe rely on KLA to ensure that their fabs ramp next-generation devices to volume production quickly and cost-effectively. Enabling the movement towards advanced chip design, KLA's Global Products Group (GPG), which is responsible for creating all of KLA’s metrology and inspection products, is looking for the best and the brightest research scientist, software engineers, application development engineers, and senior product technology process engineers.The LS-SWIFT Division of KLA’s Global Products Group provides patterned wafer inspection systems for high-volume semiconductor manufacturing. Its mission is to deliver market-leading cost of ownership in defect detection for a broad range of applications in the production of semiconductors. Customers from the foundry, logic, memory, automotive, MEMS, advanced packaging and other markets rely upon high-sample wafer inspection information generated by LS-SWIFT products.LS (Laser Scanning) systems enable cost-effective patterned wafer defect detection for the industry’s most sophisticated process technologies deployed in leading-edge foundry, logic, DRAM, and NAND fabs. SWIFT (Simultaneous Wafer Inspection at Fast Throughput) systems deliver all-wafer-surface (frontside, backside, and edge) macro inspection that is critical for automotive IC, MEMS, and advanced packaging processes as well as foundry/logic and memory fabs.LS-SWIFT operates from a global footprint that includes the US, Singapore, India and Germany, and serves a worldwide customer base across Asia, Europe and North America.ResponsibilitiesDirect the development of company market requirements for specific product(s) or product line(s), including product strategy definition, requirements analysis, and pricing. Monitor the development of business plans, managing lifecycles, and product positioning in the marketplace. Reduce broad concepts and business strategies into structured product marketing plans. Oversees market research, monitors competitive activity, and identifies customer needs. Establish pricing strategies. Interact with engineering, manufacturing and sales to enhance existing product(s) or product line(s). Leads new product definition and business plans with joint departments. Selects, develops, and evaluates personnel to ensure the efficient operation of the function. Employees matched to this job family should have responsibility for managing people in addition to product responsibility.Works on issues of diverse scope where requires some level of analysis. Collects data on a variety of factors, including market trends, customer information, competition and environmental information, in order to support or provide input on the company strategies or policies. Executes strategies and supports sales channel for a region or a customer.QualificationsMS/MBA/PhD Preferred3 - 5 years working experience in Semiconductor/Semiconductor Capital Equipment industry in Applications. Or working Fab experience in engineering roles, scientific instrumentation

title: Project Manager (Artificial Intelligence Solutions)
description: Joining BasisAI’s delivery team, you will be leading the delivery of AI and machine learning solutions with our enterprise customers, powered by our Bedrock machine learning platform. You will help enterprises harness the power of AI/ML to enable fundamental change for their businesses.We value a growth mindset, and are prepared to give capable and passionate professionals a chance to grow and take leadership roles beyond their experience on paper.Your exposure:Accountable for the overall client and project management in the delivery stage which includes ensuring client satisfaction, managing changes of scope, prioritisation and managing client expectationsBe the interface between the client and our internal product and solutions engineering teamsGather customer feedback and provide it to the product teamIdentify new value areas to propose to support customer renewals and new projectsPrepare presentations to communicate project progress and outcomes to customerOversee and manage the quality of project delivery to ensure client satisfaction by prioritizing and managing client expectations to successful delivery of software developmentDevelop strategy and engagement plan to produce project deliverables such as training materials, reference guides, FAQs, stakeholder assessmentsQualificationsDegree holder in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering. Prior experience in software engineering or data science is a strong plus.Proficient in data science, machine learning and artificial intelligence, with a deep understanding of what the state of the art can achieve and how it can be applied to solve business problems. A passion and willingness to learn about such technologies is essential.Minimum of four years of professional experience in mid to large scale solution development projects (i.e. several hundred man-days), from a software consulting firm or systems integrator.Confident, proactive, organised, strong relationship management and a willingness to work with a multidisciplinary team.Prepared to go outside your comfort zone with a strong growth mind-set, and prepared to work .About BasisAIWe founded BasisAI to help make it really simple for data scientists to deploy their Machine Learning models into production. As data scientists, we understand the frustration of wrangling with infrastructure for months in order to get a model deployed, and we want to make that experience intuitive and delightful instead. We are a seed stage, 20-person startup and have raised USD 6M in funding from Sequoia and Temasek.https://techcrunch.com/2019/01/09/basisai/https://www.techinasia.com/prominent-singaporean-data-scientists-raise-6m-sequoia-temasek-ai-startupWe are proud of the team we have created. We pay competitively, and give generous equity grants to all our hires. We win if everyone wins together.

title: Customer Success Account Manager
description: Microsoft is on a mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. Our culture is centered on embracing a growth mindset, a theme of inspiring excellence, and encouraging teams and leaders to bring their best each day. In doing so, we create life-changing innovations that impact billions of lives around the world. You can help us to achieve our mission.Customer Success: Microsoft aspires to help our customers achieve their own digital transformation, leveraging the power of Microsoft Cloud solutions and support offerings. To this end, Microsoft invests in a dedicated Customer Success team that will help Microsoft customers successfully realize their business outcomes.ResponsibilitiesAs a Customer Success Account Manager, you are the primary customer facing role responsible for customer success through the management of program deliveries and strong customer relationships. The prevailing business priority is the customers’ successful adoption and productive use of Microsoft cloud technologies. You are front and center with our customers supporting their digital journey and empowering them to achieve more!Key Accountabilities include:Fulfill Support contract obligations by driving quality planning and delivery of Support services to realize customer business outcomes and overall experience with Microsoft solutions.Partner with your customer and Account Team to prioritize and plan customer engagements and programs across cloud and on-premise workloads.Define outcomes to improve the health, performance, and business capabilities of the prioritized workloads to drive customer value realization.Orchestration, customer sponsor management, and stakeholder communication of prioritized engagements and programs.Track, escalate, and plan for the remediation of technical blockers and provide engineering feedback to further our product and solutions as appropriate.QualificationsWe are looking for a highly motivated and passionate Customer Success Account Manager (CSAM) to drive program management for Strategic accounts that have a significant number of key cross cloud workload engagements running concurrently. As the CSAM you will drive acceleration of cloud adoption from Pilot/MVP to production for customers’ cloud engagements by providing cross-engagement oversight, resource orchestration, and blocker escalation in close collaboration with key account team unit members and business partners supporting customer success.Experience - 5+ years of success in complex technical engagement management and/or program management required. Prior work experience in a Program Manager or Engagement Manager position focused on Cloud and software/services solution preferred.Leadership - This role requires strong communication skills, as well as displaying executive presence and confidence in varying levels of customer situations. The CSAM must show leadership in teams comprised of Microsoft, Partner and customer resources who may be engaged in the delivery of complex solutions for overall customer success.Relationship Building - Proven track record of building relationships with senior customer executives in large or highly strategic accounts. Experience in managing various stakeholder relationships to get consensus on solutions/engagements required.Program Management - Excellent skills in planning for a portfolio of engagements, cross-group collaboration, resource orchestration, communications, analytical capabilities, and attention to detail required.Collaboration and Communication - Proven track record of driving decisions collaboratively, resolving conflicts, and ensuring follow-through with verbal and written communication. Strong presentation skills with a high degree of comfort with both large and small audiences and various levels of management (Senior Executives, IT management, Database administrators and Data Scientist).Technical - Experience with cloud and hybrid infrastructures, architecture designs, and migrations preferred. Knowledge of market trends and competitive insights preferred. Understanding of partner ecosystems and the ability to leverage partner solutions to solve customer needs preferred.Education - Bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering or related field preferred. Certification(s) in the following preferred:o Project Management: PMPo Technologies: Cloud, mobile, web application development, cloud-native application architectureTravel required: 0-30%Relocation will be considered for qualified candidatesMicrosoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application or the recruiting process, please send a request via the Accommodation request form.Benefits/perks listed below may vary depending on the nature of your employment with Microsoft and the country where you work.

title: Senior Product Manager for Discovery and Personalization
description: ZALORA is currently looking to find the most talented Senior Product Manager to join our Regional Product Management team and be part of the ‘Discovery and Personalization’ squad. As a senior product manager within the ‘Discovery and Personalization’ squad, you will work hand in hand with our engineering team and our business teams to deliver a tailor-made experience that inspires and guides users in their shopping journey with ZALORA.The role will be reporting to the Principal Product Manager and will act as a member of the Regional Product Management team(IT Engineering department), which defines the product road map for all of ZALORA’s markets in SEA.This position will be based in Singapore or considered to open for remote working.ResponsibilitiesLead ZALORA’s “Discovery and personalization” mission-based cross-functional squad consisting of designers, product managers, data scientists, and developers to voice our users’ needs through personalization efforts.Prioritize product roadmap with qualitative and quantitative research, product analysis, and market insights for meaningful impact.Assure that user experience, features, and workflows within the platform deliver the expected business benefit.Manage the communication and collaboration between our engineering team and business stakeholders.Write detailed (technical and non-technical) requirements for our developers and work with them to assure that the features are delivered as requested.RequirementsDiligent, detail-oriented and possess the ability to work on discovery, prioritization and delivery of the multitude of great ideas coming your way.Understand e-commerce concepts and preferably have previous experience in e-commerce businesses.An analytical mindset and skill-set (A/B experimentation, data analysis, user testing).Deep understanding of the customer, data, business, and e-commerce industry.A passion for design excellence, usability & consumer appeal in products.A sense of urgency, pragmatism, and a solution-oriented approach to problem-solving.Guide the team to define a product strategy within the framework of build-measure-learn.Hands-on approach with strong project management to meet deliverables.At least 6 years of working experience and 3 years as a Product Manager.What we offerIntegration into a highly-skilled, successful, and ambitious teamA versatile and responsible roleThe ability to make an immediate impact - we’re an agile company and your ideas and effort matter!Fun & casual working atmosphereInternational mindset and close collaboration with managementIf this sounds like the next big adventure you want to take on in your career then please send us your CV + a cover letter (max. 200 words) why you want to be a Product Manager @ZALORA!Powered by JazzHR23r2DGlYi3

title: Business Development Manager (Renewable Energy Stationed in Thailand)
description: Company IntroductionAt Envision Digital, our mission is to connect a fragmented world of technology and build a connected experience. With billions of devices, sensors and applications out there, Envision Digital task is to leverage on it to develop applications that improves business performances holistically. Envision Digital has been doing this with its EnOS Intelligent IoT platform, an operating system that integrates applications, sensor technology and information together to re-define the “New” experience.Envision is filled with passionate doers who believe we can make a difference to the world: resourceful business leaders who are collaborating closely with customers to identify pain and define vision; agile developers and solution architects who are redesigning platform experience on IoT, industry domain gurus who continue to develop problem solving applications, meteorologist who turns weather forecasting solutions beyond predictions and data scientist reshaping the world with data.Envision Digital is here to unleash new potential of industrial digital transformation into sustainable ecosystem of information, experience and technology, co-creating a brave new world with partners and customers. This is a promise to help organization and people exploit the digital potential to improve our business performance, quality of life, and sustainable living experience to create a better-connected world we envision to work, live, play and have fun in.Job DescriptionThe position is an experienced business development role with deep industrial experience in Renewable Energy (RE) industry namely solar, wind and hydro to drive sales and business engagement. The leader should possess operational, project and maintenance know-how of RE companies with focus on solar domain. The leader will need to have good sense of digital transformation and industrial IoT understanding. He/she must possess collaborative leadership in a multinational and multicultural setting as a self-starter for collaboration with:External clients to understand their pains, requirements while creating demandExternal local partner for leads and eventually deliveryInternal Solution Architects to develop viable proposal for clientsInternal Domain leaders to develop relevant productsInternal IoT Platform team to develop domain applications and solutionsThe leader is expected to exercise consultative selling approach during initial customer engagement and gradually develop into trusted advisor level. He/she is expected to be resourceful and independent to create demand and streamline solutions at initial stage before passing it to solutions architect for detail proposal.Skills and QualificationsAt least 5 years of professional experience relevant to RE industry with a focus on solarUnderstanding and experience in hydro, wind and power grid is a plusProven experience of sales, business development and account management especially in Vietnam marketStrong account mapping ability to deal key stakeholders at different levelOutstanding presentation and interpersonal communication skills.Proven ability to handle multiple tasks, prioritize, and manage stretched assignments.Highly resourceful and comfortable working in a fast-paced entrepreneurial environment.Self-motivated with high quality and ethical standards for themselves and others.Ability to function effectively and decisively in sometimes fluid or ambiguous situations.A strong team players and collaborative in natureSolid analytical and consulting skills with good knowledge of industry best practices.Role and Responsibilities Create business development strategy and drive the business plan for the market in Thailand. (To station in Thailand)Pursue new opportunities and create demand activelyPresent value messaging effectively to customers with solutions selling mindset.Respond to tender opportunities and lead pursuit strategy which include local partnership.Seek & establish deep understanding of the client’s business across all client stakeholdersEstablish trusted advisor client relationships to enable mutual growth in the futureIdentify goals and deliverables with appropriate budgets for a particular project opportunity.Establish and refine processes where required to manage accounts efficiently.30-60% of local and international travel for client engagements and internal meetings

title: Senior Manager - Digital Enterprise Services (Business Analyst)
description: To work closely with respective project team members within the DES team. The main tasks includes performing detailed analysis of market sizing and segmentation, opportunity and scenario analysis, and documentation. To succeed, candidate should have a natural analytical way of thinking and be able to articulate complex analysis and scenarios in a simple manner. Job Responsibilities Analyze and evaluate market opportunity for broadband market size, demographic, technology, etc. Gathering critical information and statistics relevant to the business Documenting and communicating / presenting the results to key stakeholders Key Experiences and Qualifications Bachelors Degree in business or related field Minimum 7 ear eperience in business analysis, data scientist or similar role, preferably in Telco Exceptional analytic and conceptual thinking skills Excellent documentation and reporting skills MS Excel, PowerPointCompany OverviewU Mobile is Malaysia’s most dynamic and innovative mobile telecommunication service provider that offers millions of next generation mobile consumers the freedom to “Live Connected”. Since 2007, the company has been constantly providing high quality mobile voice and data services with its wide distribution network backed by affordable pricing strategies. It has one of the most unique telecommunications network structures in the region backed by its own-built network infrastructure, which supports high-speed mobile broadband; and Asia’s first active 3G Radio Access Network (RAN) sharing, covering major urban areas in the East and West Malaysia.Customers of U Mobile can choose from a variety of competitive prepaid, postpaid, high-speed mobile Internet plans and latest mobile devices to achieve a fully connected lifestyle anywhere and anytime . The products and services distinguish themselves through attractive value propositions and value-added services, giving consumers high quality mobile services at best value rates. U Mobile also made its products and services to be highly accessible through traditional and non-traditional distribution channels to broaden audience reach. These strategic business approaches are the core reasons why U Mobile was awarded the coveted Frost & Sullivan’s “Most Promising Service Provider of the Year” at the 2012 Frost & Sullivan Malaysia Excellence Awards.U Mobile’s major shareholders include U Telemedia Sdn Bhd (an investment by Tan Sri Vincent Tan, Founder of Berjaya Group) and Straits Mobile Investments Pte Ltd (a subsidiary of Singapore Technologies Telemedia Pte Ltd - ST Telemedia). U Telemedia’s stake in U Mobile provides an unparalleled support advantage, as U Mobile is able to reach out to a wider audience through the Berjaya Group of Companies for its nationwide distribution channels, local business network and joint marketing collaborations. This partnership is also supported by ST Telemedia’s telecommunications expertise, which gives U Mobile an edge by increasing competitiveness in the marketplace.U Mobile will continue to leverage on strategic partnerships and innovation to translate technological advancements into more affordable and flexible products and services for its millions of customers. The aim is to provide customers an enhanced and seamless mobile experience with U Mobile.Live Connected with U Mobile!For more information, please visit http://www.u.com.my or participate in U Mobile’s various social activities by visiting http://www.fb.com/umobile.Why Join Us?We’re a company that’s all about fun and we welcome new members to join and grow further with us. Today, U Mobile boasts a vibrant workforce and culture that centre on its 5 corporate values of excellence through Passion, Trustworthy, Innovation, Teamwork and Fun . title: Digital Account Manager
description: Department OverviewIn FALCON, we do not subscribe to the traditional mould of account management. Our account management team are part scientist, part entrepreneur and part artist. You need to become a business partner to the clients, anticipating their business needs and leading the conversations with them. You need to be creative, understand and use data, and have the skills to grow your account and manage campaigns and projects with both internal and external stakeholders.RoleRoleAs a Digital Account Manager, you will be leading and managing clients and campaigns, and be involved in new business pitches. You will handle a wide range of assignments, projects and clients with a high degree of success and independence. Ability to speak, read and write other languages is a plus.Proven ability in managing and executing multi-channel social media campaigns is a must, with a solid understanding of content creation, social media analytics and social media buying.Experience in email marketing, search marketing and digital media, including key marketing channels and tools like Facebook, Google Analytics and AdWords etc will be plus points.Experience working on local and regional accounts. Having worked on global MNC accounts would be a plus.Proven ability to solve business challenges creatively and effectively via technology, communication, and marketing.Able to prioritise and efficiently work under pressure, and on tight deadlines while coping with the requirements of a fast-moving environment.Detail-oriented and result-driven team player with an inquisitive mind-set and can-do attitude.Able to prepare decks and confidently present to clients.Is an excellent team player and demonstrates a high level of integrity in his/her approach to work and with all stakeholders ie colleagues, clients and partners/vendors.Able to communicate effectively and confidently, and work with all stakeholders ie colleagues, clients and partners/vendors.Able to ensure smooth day-to-day operation of projects with minimal supervision.Demonstrates leadership qualities, has a solution-first attitude, and is eager-to-learn and willing to pitch in on anything.Be perceived as dependable, with a potential to lead junior team members.

title: Agile Project Manager
description: We are looking for a passionate and driven Agile Project Manager to join our fast-growing team in Singapore. The ideal candidate will be familiar and comfortable working in a fast-paced agile environment and has strong knowledge and experience working in Kanban and scrum project settings to manage projects. title: Product Manager #SGUnitedJobs
description: Overview:We are looking for an experienced Product Manager to work with our Lead PM to execute on new product launches end-to-end. We are at the inflection point for growth, and we need strong product people to carry us forward. You should be comfortable in a hands-on, collaborative and flexible environment, with the ability to manage multiple product projects simultaneously while driving towards aggressive goals.You will work closely with a Lead PM, Engineering, CS, Design, and the rest of the product team members to execute high quality delivery of all elements required for your product launches, iterations, and long-term metric achievement. You will be a guiding force for some of the highest-profile initiatives in the company's history, driving significant growth and you'll be held to understandably high standards.Responsibilities:This Product Manager will be the "CEO” of up to 1-2 product releases per quarter executing on the outlined product strategy and coordinating with our Lead PM and Product Designer on some of our key product initiatives in 2021.Understand the ultimate user experience that we want to deliver to our customers, and generate solutions to enhance their experience across the product lines you manageOwn product metrics, analyzing data, and reporting regarding the products you launch. Product discovery is a huge part of our process here with not only metrics but also a deep collection of customer interviews to dive into clear observation and validation of your target persona’s pain points.You should have a knack for both front end UX and back end architecture, though you will also work with world-class engineering resources to supplement your feasibility requirementsAbility to communicate and manage team members along with collaboration of shared resources across the department including Designers, Data Scientists, System Architects, and sales / CS reps who can all help you execute and unravel mysteries.You need to be a constant learner, and someone who can structure product initiatives like Beta tests and segmented roll-outs to maximize learning in order to iterate on the product.You should have context about B2B sales enterprise software, CRM integrations, or a clear path to achieve it rapidly.Qualifications:3+ years of pure Product Management experience in SaaS, digital, B2B, or data related products. We are looking for candidates at multiple seniority levelsA track record of launching innovative products/features in addition to experience in defining a company’s objectives, and launching products with key data-driven tacticsImpeccable written, verbal and presentation skills (English)Ability to think strategically and execute tacticallyExcellent problem-solving, organizational and analytical skillsPrior work experience and/or education in a Computer Science or engineering capacity would be idealTechnical understanding. (A plus!) You won't write code and we don't expect you to, but you do need to understand the implications of the features you're prioritizing and be able to communicate both ways with the engineers.

title: Product Marketing Manager
description: Company OverviewKLA is a global leader in diversified electronics for the semiconductor manufacturing ecosystem. Virtually every electronic device in the world is produced using our technologies. No laptop, smartphone, wearable device, voice-controlled gadget, flexible screen, VR device or smart car would have made it into your hands without us. KLA invents systems and solutions for the manufacturing of wafers and reticles, integrated circuits, packaging, printed circuit boards and flat panel displays. The innovative ideas and devices that are advancing humanity all begin with inspiration, research and development. KLA focuses more than average on innovation and in 2019 we invested 15% of sales back into R&D. Our expert teams of physicists, engineers, data scientists and problem-solvers work together with the world’s leading technology providers to accelerate the delivery of tomorrow’s electronic devices. Life here is exciting and our teams thrive on tackling really hard problems. There is never a dull moment with us.Group/DivisionWith over 40 years of semiconductor process control experience, chipmakers around the globe rely on KLA to ensure that their fabs ramp next-generation devices to volume production quickly and cost-effectively. Enabling the movement towards advanced chip design, KLA's Global Products Group (GPG), which is responsible for creating all of KLA’s metrology and inspection products, is looking for the best and the brightest research scientist, software engineers, application development engineers, and senior product technology process engineers. The LS-SWIFT Division of KLA’s Global Products Group provides patterned wafer inspection systems for high-volume semiconductor manufacturing. Its mission is to deliver market-leading cost of ownership in defect detection for a broad range of applications in the production of semiconductors. Customers from the foundry, logic, memory, automotive, MEMS, advanced packaging and other markets rely upon high-sample wafer inspection information generated by LS-SWIFT products. LS (Laser Scanning) systems enable cost-effective patterned wafer defect detection for the industry’s most sophisticated process technologies deployed in leading-edge foundry, logic, DRAM, and NAND fabs. SWIFT (Simultaneous Wafer Inspection at Fast Throughput) systems deliver all-wafer-surface (frontside, backside, and edge) macro inspection that is critical for automotive IC, MEMS, and advanced packaging processes as well as foundry/logic and memory fabs. LS-SWIFT operates from a global footprint that includes the US, Singapore, India and Germany, and serves a worldwide customer base across Asia, Europe and North America.Company Overview Calling the adventurers ready to join a company that's pushing the limits of nanotechnology to keep the digital revolution rolling. At KLA, we're making technology advancements that are bigger—and tinier—than the world has ever seen. Who are we? We research, develop, and manufacture the world's most advanced inspection and measurement equipment for the semiconductor and nanoelectronics industries. We enable the digital age by pushing the boundaries of technology, creating tools capable of finding defects smaller than a wavelength of visible light. We create smarter processes so that technology leaders can manufacture high-performance chips—the kind in that phone in your pocket, the tablet on your desk and nearly every electronic device you own—faster and better. We're passionate about creating solutions that drive progress and help people do what wouldn't be possible without us. The future is calling. Will you answer? Group/DivisionWith over 40 years of semiconductor process control experience, chipmakers around the globe rely on KLA to ensure that their fabs ramp next-generation devices to volume production quickly and cost-effectively. Enabling the movement towards advanced chip design, KLA's Global Products Group (GPG), which is responsible for creating all of KLA’s metrology and inspection products, is looking for the best and the brightest research scientist, software engineers, application development engineers, and senior product technology process engineers.The LS-SWIFT Division of KLA’s Global Products Group provides patterned wafer inspection systems for high-volume semiconductor manufacturing. Its mission is to deliver market-leading cost of ownership in defect detection for a broad range of applications in the production of semiconductors. Customers from the foundry, logic, memory, automotive, MEMS, advanced packaging and other markets rely upon high-sample wafer inspection information generated by LS-SWIFT products.LS (Laser Scanning) systems enable cost-effective patterned wafer defect detection for the industry’s most sophisticated process technologies deployed in leading-edge foundry, logic, DRAM, and NAND fabs. SWIFT (Simultaneous Wafer Inspection at Fast Throughput) systems deliver all-wafer-surface (frontside, backside, and edge) macro inspection that is critical for automotive IC, MEMS, and advanced packaging processes as well as foundry/logic and memory fabs.LS-SWIFT operates from a global footprint that includes the US, Singapore, India and Germany, and serves a worldwide customer base across Asia, Europe and North America.ResponsibilitiesDirect the development of company market requirements for specific product(s) or product line(s), including product strategy definition, requirements analysis, and pricing. Monitor the development of business plans, managing lifecycles, and product positioning in the marketplace. Reduce broad concepts and business strategies into structured product marketing plans. Oversees market research, monitors competitive activity, and identifies customer needs. Establish pricing strategies. Interact with engineering, manufacturing and sales to enhance existing product(s) or product line(s). Leads new product definition and business plans with joint departments. Selects, develops, and evaluates personnel to ensure the efficient operation of the function. Employees matched to this job family should have responsibility for managing people in addition to product responsibility.Works on issues of diverse scope where requires some level of analysis. Collects data on a variety of factors, including market trends, customer information, competition and environmental information, in order to support or provide input on the company strategies or policies. Executes strategies and supports sales channel for a region or a customer.QualificationsMS/MBA/PhD Preferred3 - 5 years working experience in Semiconductor/Semiconductor Capital Equipment industry in Applications. Or working Fab experience in engineering roles, scientific instrumentationWe offer a competitive, family friendly total rewards package. We design our programs to reflect our commitment to an inclusive environment, while ensuring we provide benefits that meet the diverse needs of our employees.KLA is proud to be an equal opportunity employer

title: Principal Product Manager - Search
description: Department: ProductMake A Real Difference At PropertyGuru.Real Aspirations. Real People. Real impact.At PropertyGuru Group, we believe that every person – no matter what their circumstance – should have a place to call home. That’s why we’ve been on a mission to transform how people find, finance and own home across Southeast Asia over the last 13 years.Voted by property seekers as “Asia’s Most Influential Brand for Online Property Search”, PropertyGuru enables real-world aspirations through digital transformation and constant innovation. Every day, the work that we do has a real and positive impact on thousands of lives.As an employee, you’ll be empowered by our community work culture, where everyone has the autonomy, support and resources to do the best work of their careers. As we evolve our journey to help people make confident property decisions, we stay true to our core values to guide the way we work and the decisions we make every step of the way: we own it and deliver it, we have fun and celebrate success, we respect and care for each other, we push beyond good, and we create what’s next.RoleUnderstand and internalize how Search impacts PropertyGuru’s consumer segments (Property Seekers, Agents, and Developers).Lead the product direction and roadmap for property seekers’ Search experience.Work with property agent and developer product teams to build, enhance, and deliver the best user experience for Searching and Discovering property.Imagine what Search capability would be needed tomorrow, and make it happen.Leverage and co-develop (with data scientist) recommendation as service to maximize and improve discovery of properties in the platform.Manage the entire product life cycle from inception to launch to sunset, includes defining product ideas/requirements, market opportunity, hypothesis/use cases, approving UX, and setting success metrics.Work closely with product designers and researchers to deliver best-in-class experience.Communicate product concept and direction to the broader organization, as well as actively managing status updates and decision making with main stakeholders.Analyze user quality metrics, propose improvement actions, design, and deploy successful A/B experiments.Build strong partnerships with stakeholders from our marketing, Sales, Operations, and Engineering teams.Requirement.8+ years’ of PM or product engineering experience.6+ years’ direct experience in managing both Web and App products.Demonstrated track record of product leadership. Ability to lead and influence teams.Strong analytical skills, critical thinking, and curiosity to peel the onion to discover opportunities for business impact and better user experience.Strong product sense and empathy of user search needs and pain points.A strong bias for excellence in user experience.Excellent and experienced influencer, collaborator, communicator, and facilitator.Managing search experience/product in the past is a big-big plus.Great attention to detail but base your strategy on the big picture objectivesRole is expected to interface and collaborate with data scientists on an ongoing basis.Direct experience for Malaysia, Thailand, or Indonesia market is a plus.Advertised: 02 Dec 2020 Singapore Standard TimeApplications close:

title: R&D Manager
description: Job Description: Nutrition Technologies is a pioneering Agtech company operating in Johor, Malaysia. We produce sustainable ingredients for the animal feed industry by growing insects (specifically Black Soldier Flies - Hermetia illucens) on factory food waste. Our products are sustainable insect protein meal and oil ingredients for the animal feed market. We are a leading insect producer in Asia and have completed commissioning a commercial scale production facility in 2020.You would oversee a small team of research scientists within the Research and Development Department at Nutrition Technologies. You would work closely with other R&D managers and counterparts in other departments . You would be responsible for designing and implementing applied experiments in a fast-paced environment. The scope of research would include physiology, nutrition, microbiology, breeding, product development and process optimization as they relate to the mass production of Black Soldier Flies (Hermetia illucens).We are looking for a motivated and dynamic researcher with prior experience in Black Soldier Fly rearing in a private company or public research institution. Candidates should also have prior experience in supervisor / managerial positions.Required Qualifications: Prior experience in breeding/rearing Black Soldier Flies (Hermetia illucens)Bachelor's degree or higher in Life Sciences, preferably involving either Entomology or animal nutrition/husbandryPrior experience in supervisor or managerial positions, preferably in research settingsDemonstrated understanding of and experience with the scientific method. Extensive prior experience designing and conducting experiments.Confident conducting a range of statistical analysesExcellent writing, communication, and organizational skills to include presentation to technical and non-technical audience in English.Strong critical thinking skills and demonstrated evidence based decision makingDemonstrated ability to manage and motivate research staff of diverse backgroundsPreferred Qualifications: Holding a Ms or higher in Entomology or closely related disciplinePrior experience in private sector Research & DevelopmentPassionate about insects and their role in sustainable food systemsPersonal SpecificationsAdaptiveness- Able to ‘hit the ground running’ in a new country and adapt to a fast-paced stressful startup environment. Prior international experience and start-up experience will help.Intellectual Agility - Quick to find and learn new information and to solve complex problems. Constant curiosity about how things work and how to solve problemsIntellectual Humility - You navigate the uncertainty of research by freely lack of knowledge and admitting you were wrong if the data shows otherwiseWork Ethic - you maintain a high standard for your work and go the extra mile without being asked. But your work balances speed and quality to match the circumstances required.Leadership- you inspire others to do their best work and understand the many different ways to motivate your team while giving them the space to be creative.Job Type: Full-timeSchedule:Day shiftMonday to Friday
skills: ['Critical Thinking', 'Decision Making', 'English', 'Ethics', 'Golang', 'Leadership', 'Life Science', 'Market', 'Microbiology', 'Nutrition', 'Organizational Skill', 'Physiology', 'Presentation', 'Product Development', 'Research and Development (R&D)', 'Scientific Method', 'Uncertainty', 'Writing', 'Written Communication']

title: Operational Audit Manager
description: Company OverviewKLA is a global leader in diversified electronics for the semiconductor manufacturing ecosystem. Virtually every electronic device in the world is produced using our technologies. No laptop, smartphone, wearable device, voice-controlled gadget, flexible screen, VR device or smart car would have made it into your hands without us. KLA invents systems and solutions for the manufacturing of wafers and reticles, integrated circuits, packaging, printed circuit boards and flat panel displays. The innovative ideas and devices that are advancing humanity all begin with inspiration, research and development. KLA focuses more than average on innovation and in 2019 we invested 15% of sales back into R&D. Our expert teams of physicists, engineers, data scientists and problem-solvers work together with the world’s leading technology providers to accelerate the delivery of tomorrow’s electronic devices. Life here is exciting and our teams thrive on tackling really hard problems. There is never a dull moment with us.Group/DivisionKLA is well known for its high-performing business model which routinely produces significant profit margins and revenue. Key to supporting KLA business is the finance team that partners with corporate and global business organizations to provide expertise and guidance for developing and executing sound business models and practices. The Finance organization consists of operations and corporate finance teams. The operations finance team influences business decisions by gathering the best available operations information, distilling it and making recommendations to our management team on the best course of action. The corporate team provides a broad range of services, such as financial planning, corporate accounting, tax, industry analysis and benchmarking, internal audits, SEC reporting and merger and acquisition support.Responsibilities:We are looking for a sharp, motivated professional with strong communication and interpersonal skills to add to our global team. The individual will be able to solve problems, working independently under general supervision with considerable latitude for initiative and independent judgment.International travel is required.Key areas of responsibility include the following:Plan, prioritize and manage multiple global projects (audits and advisory / consultative projects) and deadlines to provide independent assurance, advice, and insightSupport the development of the annual risk assessment and provide input to the development of the risk-based audit plan anticipating challenges and risks in changing environmentsPerform and lead audits including the following:Design audit programs applying internal auditing concept & practices, strong analytical skills, and business acumenConduct interviews and document key operational processes & related controlsIdentify and integrate operational issues, financial concepts and data into compelling, relevant, value-added, actionable recommendationsCommunicate the results of projects via written or oral presentations to managementWork effectively with different levels of divisional and functional management to develop and implement practical and actionable solutions to address audit findingsIdentify opportunities to streamline, automate, and drive digital transformation for efficiency and to scale to support the growth and complexity of the organizationShare best practices and insights to enhance organizational value and optimize and advocate for internal controls and continuous improvementsQualifications:Bachelor's Level Degree in Accounting or Finance with at least 10 years of relevant experienceComfortable working in an ambiguous environment and flexible with constant change and maintain composure under pressureExecutive presence with effective stakeholder management skills in matrix environmentHard-working self-starter with a positive attitude and ability to work independently, meet deadlines and is willing to contribute to and lead a teamIndependent and critical thinker, analytical, fast-learner with sense of ownership, urgency, and intellectual curiosityAssignment on cross functional team, Bachelors of Arts or Science (Bachelors), Business Insight (Autonomy), Communication (Autonomy), Courage (Autonomy), Customer Focus (Autonomy), Drives Results (Autonomy), Drive Vision & Purpose (Autonomy), KLA Values (Learning), Manages Ambiguity (Autonomy), Strategic Mindset (Autonomy), Technical / Functional (Autonomy)We offer a competitive, family friendly total rewards package. We design our programs to reflect our commitment to an inclusive environment, while ensuring we provide benefits that meet the diverse needs of our employees.KLA is proud to be an equal opportunity employer

title: Senior Product Manager - Marketplace (Supply Shaping)
description: Get to know the Role :A Product Manager at Marketplace Tech Family focuses to create a reliable, affordable, and sustainable marketplace experience for all Grab's customersMarketplace Tech Family builds the most effective products, tools, strategies, and processes that can help streamline all the key marketplace levers across all the businesses and services on the Grab platform.This role focuses on building products for supply shaping, which aims to get the right amount of supply in the market at any given area-time, regionally.The day-to-day activities:Develop innovative and industry-leading marketplace products that uniquely serve our customers and differentiate our products from competitors.Collaborate with engineering, design, analytics, data scientists, economists, and other stakeholders to define an ambitious strategy, develop and maintain a prioritized product backlog, and execute on delivering delightful and impactful experiences for customers.Work with product marketing, operations, and other stakeholders on innovative and well defined go-to-market plans.Ship minimum-loveable-products based on quantitative and qualitative data on user behavior and experimentation.Define success metrics and consistently measure the impact of your work.Work with operations and economists to ensure Grab has the most efficient setup to achieve its objective.Lead or be part of the team to deliver the roadmap through agile sprint cycles, breaking down the product roadmap into executable stories and requirements.The must haves:4+ years in product management, preferably at a tech company.Experience in Marketplace, Economics, or AnalyticsAn analytical and data-driven approach to problem-solving.Demonstrable success in launching new products or features with clear metrics and impactA healthy blend of strategic thinking capabilities with An innate “dream big, start small” mindset and a keen eye for detail.Empathy for users and a drive to discover and resolve their pain points.An owner’s mindset - you don’t shy away from the hard stuff.Excellent communication and presentation skills with the ability to quickly command trust and respect from executives and partners.A degree in computer science, software engineering, information technology, business, finance, economics, or related fields.Get to know Grab:Grab is more than just the leading ride-hailing and mobile payments platform in Southeast Asia. We use data and technology to improve everything from transportation to payments and financial services across a region of more than 620 million people. We work with governments, drivers, passengers, merchants, and the community, to solve critical problems in Southeast Asia.Grab began as a taxi-hailing app in 2012, but we have since extended our product platform to include GrabCar, GrabShare, GrabBike, GrabHitch, GrabExpress, GrabFood, GrabCoach, GrabShuttle, GrabCycle. We recently launched our fintech platform – GrabFinancial, which consists of payments, lending and insurance. Our latest addition is GrabVentures, an in-house incubation platform. We are focused on pioneering new commuting and payment alternatives for drivers and passengers with an emphasis on convenience, safety, and reliability. Currently, we offer services in 8 countries. Our R&D offices are in Singapore, Seattle, Beijing, Bangalore, Jakarta and Vietnam. We aspire to unlock the true potential of Southeast Asia and look for like-minded individuals to join us on this ride.If you share our vision of driving South East Asia forward, apply to join our team today.

title: Customer Success Account Manager
description: Job Description :Customer Success:Microsoft aspires to help our customers achieve their own digital transformation, leveraging the power of Microsoft Cloud solutions and support offerings. To this end, Microsoft invests in a dedicated Customer Success team that will help Microsoft customers successfully realize their business outcomes.Job Description ResponsibilityAs a Customer Success Account Manager, you are the primary customer facing role responsible for customer success through the management of program deliveries and strong customer relationships. The prevailing business priority is the customers' successful adoption and productive use of Microsoft cloud technologies. You are front and center with our customers supporting their digital journey and empowering them to achieve more!We are looking for a highly motivated and passionate Customer Success Account Manager (CSAM) to drive program management for Strategic accounts that have a significant number of key cross cloud workload engagements running concurrently. As the CSAM you will drive acceleration of cloud adoption from Pilot/MVP to production for customers' cloud engagements by providing cross-engagement oversight, resource orchestration, and blocker escalation in close collaboration with key account team unit members and business partners supporting customer success.Key Accountabilities include:Fulfill Support contract obligations by driving quality planning and delivery of Support services to realize customer business outcomes and overall experience with Microsoft solutions.Partner with your customer and Account Team to prioritize and plan customer engagements and programs across cloud and on-premise workloads.Define outcomes to improve the health, performance, and business capabilities of the prioritized workloads to drive customer value realization.Orchestration, customer sponsor management, and stakeholder communication of prioritized engagements and programs.Track, escalate, and plan for the remediation of technical blockers and provide engineering feedback to further our product and solutions as appropriate.experience - 8+ years of success in complex technical engagement management and/or program management required. prior work experience in a program manager or engagement manager position focused on cloud and software/services solution preferred.leadership - this role requires strong communication skills, as well as displaying executive presence and confidence in varying levels of customer situations. the csam must show leadership in teams comprised of microsoft, partner and customer resources who may be engaged in the delivery of complex solutions for overall customer success.relationship building - proven track record of building relationships with senior customer executives in large or highly strategic accounts. experience in managing various stakeholder relationships to get consensus on solutions/engagements required.program management - excellent skills in planning for a portfolio of engagements, cross-group collaboration, resource orchestration, communications, analytical capabilities, and attention to detail required.collaboration and communication - proven track record of driving decisions collaboratively, resolving conflicts, and ensuring follow-through with verbal and written communication. strong presentation skills with a high degree of comfort with both large and small audiences and various levels of management (senior executives, it management, database administrators and data scientist).technical - experience with cloud and hybrid infrastructures, architecture designs, and migrations preferred. knowledge of market trends and competitive insights preferred. understanding of partner ecosystems and the ability to leverage partner solutions to solve customer needs preferred.education - bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience. bachelor's degree in computer science, information technology, engineering or related field preferred. certification(s) in the following preferred:project management: pmptechnologies: cloud, mobile, web application development, cloud-native application architecturetravel required: 0-30%**due to current pandemic related to covid-19 and the visa/borders restrictions in place, we are unable to hire talent who cannot work fromintended locations. therefore, we will be prioritizing candidates who can commence work in posted locationswithin intended hiring timeframe. we are actively monitoring the situation and will review our hiring stance accordingly as circumstances evolve.

title: Senior Manager, Marketing Strategy and Analytics (Bangkok-based, relocation provided)
description: About AgodaAgoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodation, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 4,000+ talents coming from 90+ different nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enabling our customers to experience the world.Get to Know our Team:The Performance Marketing Team of Agoda is a world leader in online marketing. This department is highly data-driven and focused on developing at-scale marketing programs that improve the lifetime value of Agoda customers through measurable marketing programs and channels. The team is a blend of the best analysts, marketing strategists, and data scientists in the world. The marketing leadership at Agoda have deep experience in data science, product, strategy, and other marketing fields and have built an organization that thrives on data, creative ideas, and technology. The Performance Marketing Team also fosters a great learning environment. You will be able to learn and grow by working closely with experts from a variety of backgrounds from all over the world.In this role, you'll get to:In the Senior Manager, Marketing Strategy and Analytics role, you will lead strategic and operational initiatives that create both growth and efficiency across the company. In this role, you will work directly with multiple stakeholders, including executive leadership and various cross-functional departments to successfully implement key initiatives. You will frequently present to senior stakeholders across the company. You will impact Agoda's business through exploring new business opportunities, analyzing complex scaling challenges, and improve existing operations. We're looking for the future leaders of Agoda who think critically, learn from mistakes, and adapt quickly.What you'll need to succeed:Bachelor's degree; MBA or other advanced technical degree preferred4+ years experience in management consulting, investment banking, or strategy/business operations for a fast-growing globally operating tech companyStrong analytical abilities and experience working with large datasets.Strategic thinking and planning, hands-on and full ownership mentalityExcellent skills in presenting and analyzing data and creating actionable reports as this role requires frequent presentation to senior stakeholders across the companyExperience in and a passion for projects involving big data and statistical modelsExcellent interpersonal skills and demonstrated ability to report and persuade different levels, including senior managementIt's great if you have:Experience in experimental design and analysis is a plus#STRA #ANLS #MRKT #3 #LI-TR2 #hongkong #kualalumpur #hochiminh #jakarta #manila #hongkong #beijing #toronto #vancouver #berlin #paris #barcelona #london #madrid #bangkok data representation data analysis SQL data analytics analytics python (programming language) data mining data science r (programming language) tableau analytical skills data visualization databases business analysis business intelligence (bi) microsoft sql server machine learning statistics microsoft power bi java finance shopee traveloka google facebook ctrip trip.com makemytrip grab amazon pandas (software) artificial intelligence (ai) information technology capital one accenture upwork deloitte mckinsey bain microsoft uber lyft gojek lazada alibaba shopify expedia skyscannerEqual Opportunity EmployerAt Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. title: Presales Consultant/Manager - Thailand
description: Appier is a technology company which provides artificial intelligence platforms to help enterprises solve their most challenging business problems. Appier was established in 2012 by a passionate team of computer scientists and engineers with expertise in AI, data analysis, distributed systems, and marketing.About the roleThe Presales Consultant/Manager combines deep technical subject matter expertise with a keen understanding of how to address the critical business needs of enterprise customers through Appier's AI products.Externally, this role works closely with the regional Enterprise Solution Sales team in Thailand to close sophisticated enterprise deals, supporting the team through the full sales process of solution engineering, such as architectural design, solution presentation, standard and customized solution demonstration, customer workshop, proposals development, and work with sales team to answer RFI/RFP.Internally, this role works with the regional customer success team to ensure smooth transition to post sales implementation. This role also actively engages and collaborates with the Appier product team to provide field product feedback, mobilize the right resource to quickly address critical customer requirements.A successful candidate must maintain in-depth product knowledge of Appier products, possess excellent communication skills to deliver C-level presentation, and manage customer requirements to ensure the scope of solution can be delivered within the Appier suite of products.Task of the roleBecome an expert with our product suite, able to deliver standard and customized presentations of Appier SaaS enterprise AI solutions, as well as solution demonstration to customers from business owners of SME to C-level executives in enterprise accounts.Architect and design custom solution based on customer's requirement using Appier's suite of products, apply industry best practice, to ensure the proposed solution can meet customer's business objective and can be delivered by customer success team.Partner with sales and work on presentation materials for opportunity progression.Work on complex deals and provide response to RFPs related to product, integration, delivery, training, security and regulatory compliance.Support sales and marketing events, conferences and exhibitions.Support channel activities such as partner enablement and partner events.Provide support to sales materials development.About you[Essential]Min. 5 years of presales experience in enterprise software; ideally SaaS based offerings in Analytics, DMP or Marketing systems.Solid understanding of enterprise sales processes for Software/SaaS solutions.Ability to communicate technical and business concepts effectively to customer's mid/senior management as well as C-level executives.Ability to identify requirements and develop use cases based on customer's business priority.Self-motivated and able to work under pressure and to tight deadlines.Demonstrate problem solving skills.A bachelor's Degree required.[Nice to have]Professional knowledge of terminology, trends and concepts of Data and AI products.Sound knowledge of Marketing Automation solutions.Why join us?We believe in building a great working environment where passionate individual can give their best, and to work with a talented team. To reward Appiers for their contribution, we also work hard to offer perks and benefits to make their life betterPerks and benefitsCompany office locations at the heart of central business district (CBD) in all our countries.Well stocked pantry with snacks and drinksCompetitive salaryEquity in one of the most exciting Artificial Intelligence startup in AsiaHealth insurance for all employeesYour choice between Mac and Microsoft OSFrequent company and team gatherings to celebrate success and life in general

title: Imminent Risk Project Manager, APAC
description: The Imminent Risk team seeks to identify and prioritize imminent risks to Facebook and its users. We identify trends from external industry events and track key public affairs issues to evaluate risks, deliver action-oriented assessments to mitigate risk and provide critical insights to our internal partners. We're seeking a strong problem-solver who can drive across a number of risk vectors, manage multiple internal stakeholders, balance differing opinions and perspectives, and weigh risks in order to provide effective operational mitigation strategies as they relate to risks across the Asia-Pacific region (APAC). Successful candidates will be excellent communicators who can articulate complex issues clearly in writing and verbally, in a multi-tasking and fast paced environment. Candidates must be able to make difficult decisions under pressure, use critical thinking skills and demonstrate strong leadership and interpersonal skills to organize and build relationships with teams across the company.Drive risk analysis, strategy, and mitigation as it relates to APAC integrity issues across product, policy and enforcementLeverage critical and adversarial thinking to effectively prioritize a variety of known and unknown potential risk vectorsDevelop & coordinate the cross-functional preparation and response efforts to address imminent threats on the Facebook family of appsServe as team liaison to key local XFNs and partner closely with internal stakeholders around APAC issues, including Strategic Response, Public Policy and Comms, identifying clear roles and responsibilities, and creating accountability across contributors to achieve goals mentioned aboveEffectively educate and influence leaders and partners on the risk landscape to gain alignment and establish consensusUtilize internal resources and tools to understand content risk and inform how they can best contribute to risk mitigation execution strategiesBachelor’s degree6+ years work experience in program/project management, consulting, investigations, online ads, public policy, press management, internet safety and political campaigning/consulting in public policy, legal, political science, risk management, or related disciplineStrategic thinker with analytical problem-solving skillsWorking knowledge of policy issues affecting technology companiesEffective at consensus-building, and communicating with internal and external audiencesLeadership and interpersonal skills with a proven track record of building relationships with cross-functional teamsExperience communicating to a variety of audiences, including Engineers, Data Scientists, Product Managers, Public Policy Directors, and other leadershipAdvanced-level DegreeExperience in coaching, mentoring, or managementExperience in Crisis Management2+ years of work experience or knowledge in international internet/social media issuesFacebook's mission is to give people the power to build community and bring the world closer together. Through our family of apps and services, we're building a different kind of company that connects billions of people around the world, gives them ways to share what matters most to them, and helps bring people closer together. Whether we're creating new products or helping a small business expand its reach, people at Facebook are builders at heart. Our global teams are constantly iterating, solving problems, and working together to empower people around the world to build community and connect in meaningful ways. Together, we can help people build stronger communities - we're just getting started.

title: Project Manager
description: Founded in 2010, Lynx Analytics is a predictive analytics company run by world-class quantitative marketing scientists and industry-experienced data scientists. Our focus is to become the world's leading telecom analytics solution provider, whilst advancing graph analytics technology.This is a newly created opportunity for an experienced Project Manager to oversee our commercial projects throughout Asia or Europe, from conception through to implementation. The successful incumbent will be responsible for the full project cycle, including the definition of milestones, resource planning, task allocation, mapping of dependencies and managing timely delivery.This is a unique role, combining multiple disciplines of project delivery, account management and business development. Customer centricity and innovation is key to our sustained growth and Project Managers are expected to bring together and catalyse the performance of multi-skilled global team members from different backgrounds. At the forefront of client engagement, they are driving initiatives across multiple functionals including marketing and customer operations, and are often best positioned to notice new business opportunities. Project Managers also play a critical role in significantly improving existing solutions and in contributing to new solution development.Key responsibilities will include:Accountability for an end to end project delivery including commercial KPIs such as (delivered on time, within budget, at margin)Leading all project stages including - contracting, scoping & kick-off, execution and post-implementation reviews working closely with legal, business development, product and technical teams to ensure seamless execution. Specifically:Drive contracting phase of a new or amended project, working closely with the Legal and Business Development teams to help a contract through its approval stages at the clientDefine project scope, involving all relevant stakeholders as required (i.e. the Account Lead, CSO and the client) and ensuring commercial and technical feasibilityCreate a robust governance framework for continuous monitoring and measurement of project performance, risks, dependencies and impact on timelines with both internal and client teamsManage and lead the project team (typically three to five people) to ensure milestones, deadlines and quality standards are being met.Translate project requirements for internal technical teams and work closely with key stakeholders to implement updates and improvements as required.Building a strong relationship of trust and credibility with relevant client stakeholders both for the project and for Lynx as a company. Specifically:Regular client engagement as part of ongoing project governance and delivery to ensure transparency in committed deliveryGain a deep understanding of the client's business needs and pain points (as feasible) with feedback and understand their needs, requirements, and/or issuesActively identify new business opportunities for the company clients you are interacting with, and liaise with the Business Development team to pursue themBuild a motivating and collegiate working environment with the team aligned to our company's core values.Willingness to undertake travel as required (approximately 50%, within the region)To succeed in this role, you will need:Degree qualified, preferably in a business disciplineAt least 3+ years of experience in a project management (or similar) role, ideally in the telecommunications or financial services sectorsClient management experience and consulting experience a plusExperience with senior stakeholder management (including the ability to liaise with to C-suite executives and building sustainable client relationships)Outstanding communication and presentation skills with strong negotiation and influencing abilitiesKnowledge of predictive analytics and Big Data technology is preferred, but not essentialSolid leadership skills and a proven ability to build great teamsProven ability to liaise with internal software development teams and translate client requirements into technical specificationsHighly organised and disciplined with the ability to work autonomously and be self-managingInitiative and proactivity with an energetic and enthusiastic approachAdditional language abilities appropriate to the region would be advantageous but are not essential.In return, we offer a competitive remuneration package, flexible working hours, stock options for employees and travel opportunities throughout SE Asia and Europe.

title: Manager, Technical Program / Project (R&D)
description: Company OverviewKLA is a global leader in diversified electronics for the semiconductor manufacturing ecosystem. Virtually every electronic device in the world is produced using our technologies. No laptop, smartphone, wearable device, voice-controlled gadget, flexible screen, VR device or smart car would have made it into your hands without us. KLA invents systems and solutions for the manufacturing of wafers and reticles, integrated circuits, packaging, printed circuit boards and flat panel displays. The innovative ideas and devices that are advancing humanity all begin with inspiration, research and development. KLA focuses more than average on innovation and in 2019 we invested 15% of sales back into R&D. Our expert teams of physicists, engineers, data scientists and problem-solvers work together with the world’s leading technology providers to accelerate the delivery of tomorrow’s electronic devices. Life here is exciting and our teams thrive on tackling really hard problems. There is never a dull moment with us.KLA Overview:KLA Corporation develops industry-leading equipment and services that enable innovation throughout the electronics industry. We provide advanced process control and process-enabling solutions for manufacturing wafers and reticles, integrated circuits, packaging, printed circuit boards and flat panel displays. In close collaboration with leading customers across the globe, our expert teams of physicists, engineers, data scientists and problem-solvers design solutions that move the world forwardSurfscan-ADE is looking to hire an energetic, self-driven individual to lead a team of remote systems engineers who will work closely with service teams and customers to identify and implement product improvements which will lead to long-term product adoption and customer success.Key Responsibilities:Lead a team of remote systems engineers for long-term travel to customer sites for support and engagementTeam will support development and implementation of product improvements for existing and pre-release products to provide maximum value to the customerPerform product diagnosis and problem resolution on high level escalations and interface with applications, software, and other engineering to verify the hardware & software problems have been resolvedDrive projects to standardize findings from high level field escalations to prevent repeat occurrencesWork with customer to better understand use-cases and work with development team in HQ to shape the product improvementsFocus on projects related to new product introduction such as characterization, alpha testing, beta testing and pilot tools in the ramp phase as requiredGenerate best known method documents, design notes, and work with product support team to transfer product knowledge to tech support and field service teamsGenerate escalations and standardization reports for internal and customer reviewPreferred Qualifications:Masters / Bachelor’s in Engineering (Preferably in the field of Physics, Electrical, Mechanical or Material Science or any other related field with strong technical background)Doctorate (Academic) or work title: Assistant Manager, Recruitment
description: Job DescriptionAre you ready to take off and be part of the Allstar employee? Whether you're applying for a developer, product manager or data scientist, at AirAsia we act as One AirAsia.Be part of the recruitment team, specializes in finding candidates to fill technical roles, such as Software Engineer, Technology Lead, and Engineering Manager.You will be proactively sourcing for potential talents, take a lead on recruitment hiring projects and drive overall recruitment excellence. You should be passionate about recruiting for technical talents where hiring speed and hiring standards are high. You also enjoy working in an ambiguous environment where speed and customer obsession are key attributes for success. You have a growth mindset, are unafraid to experiment, and propose solutions based on recruitment data.You will:Develop long term relationships with the business on a global scale that meet multiple needsAcross Asia increase visibility and knowledge of AirAsia as a Travel Tech company among talents who fit the profileRun full-cycle recruiting by ensuring high standards for fast hiring is in placeAttend career fairs, interact with students and promote our employer brandIncrease our social media presence and drive social media campaigns to meet hiring needs for assigned rolesProvide timely reporting of key recruitment metrics and insights to drive decisions and improve the processEngage and collaborate with hiring managers and drive high satisfaction of recruitment service provided to themIndependently drive recruitment projects with the aim of optimizing recruitment process, increase quality and speed of deliveryYou have6-8 years of relevant working experience in a fast-paced, high-growth environmentExperience hiring senior positions, software engineering talent locally and internationallyA big plus with experience work as a Technical RecruiterFamiliarity with Applicant Tracking Systems and resume databasesHave worked on high volume roles but also niche positionsExperience in building relationships with partners and customers, externally and internallyExperience developing a strategy, planning and executing against that strategyYou are self-driven and able to deliver results in an ambiguous environmentStrong communication and collaboration skills across all levelsWe are all different - one talent to another - that is how we rely on our differences. At AirAsia, you will be treated fairly and given all chances to be the best. We committed to creating a diverse work environment and are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.
